item.title: PHP Shopping Cart with PayPal Payment Gateway Integration
item.description: Shopping cart checkout with payment gateway integration (PayPal) is a most wanted article for the PHP shopping cart coders. In this article, we are going to integrate PayPal payment gateway with the shopping cart.

item.title: Responsive Contact Form with PHP
item.description: The responsive contact form is designed to fit various viewport in different width. I used CSS media queries to design this responsive contact form.

item.title: Loading Dynamic Content on a Bootstrap Modal using jQuery
item.description: Modal window can be shown in various ways by using jQuery, Bootstrap and others. In this tutorial, we are going to show the Bootstrap modal.
